1: <mistake>@@//gidben</mistake> gnas su legs par bsgyur <mistake>cing</mistake> dag <mistake>par</mistake> byas <mistake>pa'o// sngon</mistake> gyi sgra bsgyur chen <mistake>pe</mistake> <mistake>de dag</mistake> <mistake>gis//rgyud</mistake> 'di bsgyur <mistake>cid</mistake> kun la grags <mistake>lags</mistake> <mistake>mod//'on</mistake> kyang sgra don
2: <mistake>rgtsug</mistake> lag ji bzhin <mistake>du// rgyud</mistake> 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par <mistake>bsgyur//zab</mistake> cing rgya che rdo rje <mistake>thog</mistake> pa <mistake>yi//rnes</mistake> don ye shes don gnyer skyes bu <mistake>dag /chos</mistake> dang don la legs par mi rton <mistake>par//</mistake>
3: gang zag tshig <mistake>'bru'i</mistake> rjes su ma 'brang <mistake>zhig//@@//rgya</mistake> gar <mistake>skan</mistake> <mistake>du/se</mistake> ko <mistake>+ge</mistake> <mistake>sha/bodskad</mistake> <mistake>du/dbang</mistake> mdor bstan pa / dpal <mistake>rdorje</mistake> sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal <mistake>lo //zla</mistake> ba
4: bzang pos gsol <mistake>pa/ / ston</mistake> pa dbang <mistake>bskyur</mistake> rnam bdun <mistake>dang//rnam</mistake> gsum de bzhin bla na <mistake>med//jig</mistake> rten 'das pa'i dngos grub <mistake>phyir//mdor</mistake> bsdus pa yis bdag la <mistake>gsungs//</mistake>
5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' <mistake>tsal</mistake> <mistake>pa//nyon</mistake> cig zla bzang dbang bskur <mistake>do'// rnam</mistake> pa bdun dang rnam gsum mchog / rtsa yi kun spyod rtsol <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>ni//mdor</mistake> bstan pa yis khyod la bshad // rgyud du
6: mdor bstan rnam gsum <mistake>dang//rgyas</mistake> <mistake>par</mistake> bshad pa rnam gsum <mistake>'gyur// rab</mistake> tu <mistake>mngor</mistake> bstan mdor bstan <mistake>che//rab</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> rgyas <mistake>par</mistake> bshad ba <mistake>gzhan//mdor</mistake> bstan rgyas <mistake>par</mistake> bshad pa <mistake>nyi//</mistake>
7: <mistake>gsyud</mistake> yang dag par <mistake>bsdus</mistake> par <mistake>b'rjod // rab</mistake> tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad <mistake>pa//bka'</mistake> 'grel tshig ni 'byed <mistake>pa'o//mdor</mistake> <mistake>ba stan</mistake> chen po rgyas bshad <mistake>pa//'grel</mistake> bshad thams cad don ston
8: <mistake>byed//de</mistake> <mistake>ni</mistake> <mistake>mngon</mistake> shes <mistake>tho b</mistake> rnams <mistake>kyis//bya</mistake> <mistake>yi</mistake> mkhas rnams kyis min <mistake>nyid// de</mistake> ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis <mistake>dag/rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> rnal 'byor rnam bzhi <mistake>dang//rdzogs</mistake> pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams
